Class ASysVariableMessage

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.tools.message.ASysMessage
      de.systemagmbh.tools.message.ASysVariableMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISysComponent, ISysIndexableMessage, ISysMessage, ISysMessageConvertable, ISysVariableValue, ISysVariableValueMessage, Serializable
public abstract class ASysVariableMessage
extends ASysMessage
implements ISysVariableValue, ISysVariableValueMessage

Abstract implementation of the ISysVariableValue and ISysVariableValueMessage interfaces, extending ASysMessage.

Method Detail

getVariableNames

public String[] getVariableNames()
Returns all variable names used in this messages, checking all message items recursively.

Specified by:
getVariableNames in interface ISysVariableValueMessage
Returns:
all variable names

setVariableValues

public void setVariableValues(Map variableValues)
Sets the current values for a list of variables. The variable names are the map keys, the current values are the correspondent map values.

Specified by:
setVariableValues in interface ISysVariableValue
Parameters:
variableValues - a map containing all variables and their current values

getVariableValues

public Map getVariableValues()
Returns a map with the current values for a list of variables. The variable names are the map keys, the current values are the correspondent map values.

Specified by:
getVariableValues in interface ISysVariableValue
Returns:
a map containing all variables and their current values
